h2.span: Welcome to the Norwalk Ontario Wilton School District

strong.span: April 17, 2020 Message from Superintendent Dr. Burhop

p.span: The Norwalk Ontario Wilton School District is a rural school district with approximately 700 students and 120 professional and support staff. Our mission is to provide educational opportunities for all students so that they may become life-long learners and contributing citizens in our global society. In doing this, the Norwalk-Ontario-Wilton School District is committed to creating a safe and positive school environment so that all students can experience academic and personal growth. If you have any questions about our district contact Dr. Kelly T. Burhop, District Administrator at (608)337-4403 or e-mail him at
